name: Open with CoderRunner
description: Support you to launch CoderRunner directly and use it to open a file or folder instantly rather than take more time to launch Cursor from Finder. If you haven't installed CoderRunner, it will help you quickly get the CoderRunner installer and guide you to complete the installation step-by-step.

apps.name: CoderRunner
apps.description: Support you to launch Cursor directly and use it to open a file or folder instantly rather than take more time to launch Cursor from Finder. If you haven't installed Cursor, it will help you quickly get the Cursor installer and guide you to complete the installation step-by-step.

subname: Quickly open the target file or folder with CoderRunner.
